FIELD DESCRIPTION / VALUES: 40COVCCYY###, 40ENHCCYY### or 40OTCCCYY###  (Where  40 = Due from Contracts of Record - YTD Report COV / ENH / OTC indicates the drug coverage status being reported on    CCYY indicates the benefit year ### indicates sequential versions of this file.  The 4 right-most positions are populated with spaces.)
Identifies "data reported through" year.  Format is CCYY.
Identifies "data reported through" month.  Valid values are 01 through 12.
